DOC.brief_summary: The study aim map magnetoencephalographic ( MEG ) activity induce normal volunteer tap finger .
DOC.detailed_description: Normal healthy ( 20 ) volunteer tetraplegic patient ( 10 ) submit temporo-spatial mapping brain activity , sensory motor , induced simple behavioral task , consist tap finger detection pad . This do light dark environment , rythm spontaneous pace sound bips . Accelerometric record provide three dimensionnal displacement finger well time code . Brain activity simultaneously record use MEG ( 306 channel ) EEG ( 64 channel . Data process INPLS algorithm detect predictor activity , location time-course . 3D map data match patient 's anatomy provide 1.5T MRI previously perform . The aim study prepare strategy implantation multielectrodes ECoG implant restore motility tetraplegic patient human BCI protocol currently development .
